description: DRKSpider will navigate a web site from a given URL, checking internal (and external) links, style sheets, images and other files. Broken links will be reported and the sitemap displayed in a tree control. You will be able to export the sitemap to a plain text file for submitting to Google, Yahoo and other search engines.
summary: DRKSpider - DRKSpider will navigate a web site from a given URL, checking internal (and external) links, style sheets, images and other files.
